Drinking water instead of soda can help with weight loss !!
Chrome extension that will help you remember to stay hydrated and remain fresh every time ! You need not to worry about removing the notification , it will automatically disappear after 5 sec after reminding you and will not disturb you in between ! Just enter the minutes and see the magic happening ! ( The default time is 1 min so that you can see what's happening )
